response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $12,000. To make this opportunity accessible, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $10,000. This is a special offer tailored to appreciate your interest and commitment to the product. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 10000}
